author: buffalonews
title: Area bowling for Oct. 17
text:
Area bowling
Friday Morning Senior Travel
at Brad Angelo
Dan Powell 255-725, Don Bartz 719, Sandy Tanner 276-705, Gene Jankowski 267-699. Net week 10 a.m. Brad Angelo.
11TH FRAME: John Hinman Memorial — Eric Gee 279-747, Dale Colkitt 265, John Lock 252.
ABBOTT: Dick Robinson Insurance — Justin Nowakowski 257-736, Jerry Sych 267-254-733, Jeff Wells 255-705, Kyle Delaney 687, Bill Sanley Sr. 257. Thursday Seniors — Mike Stryski 659, Gary Delang 671.
ALDEN: Alden State Bank — Chuck Jagodzinski 254-712, Rick Block 253-677, Wayne Mathews 251.
BRAD ANGELO: Nin Angelo Memorial/So Cal Bar and Grill — Mar Nowak 256-696, Larae Hens Bryant 267-706, Jonathan Hejza 267-277-737, Ray Sherman Jr. 716, Andrew Herbert 259-694.
EDEN: Jerry Haag Memorial — Ron Kuras 686, Chris Brind’Amour 253.
ISLAND: Fri. Mixed — Mike Mallwitz 727, Mike Steckelberg 723, Jamie Brundage 705, John Burg 701, Travis Sperrazza 682.
LANCASTER: Eagles — Russ Priola 279-752, Rich Maloney 266-721, Mike Hermanski 255-717, Jim Reese 703, Tim Wanat 269-694.

Wayne Weller, in a 717 series in Gem Design at Tonawanda.
Tate Wilson, in a 763 series in JJ Movers at Manor.
